HEALTH HEALTH
Sunshine And Depression Sunshine And Depression

Lack of sunshine leads notonly to depres- sion but, doctors believe, it can also lower cholesterol levels. Lack of sunshine leads notonly to depres- sion but, doctors believe, it can also lower cholesterol levels.

A medical journal reveals that while lower levels of cholesterol in Mediterranean people have always been attributed to diet, sunlight may also be important since it triggers the conversion of blood cholesterolinto Vitamin D, known as the 'sunshine vitamin'. A 4-year study of some adults showed that cholesterol levels rise in cold weather and fall in hot weather - Cosmopolitan. Smile And Ease Stress Smile And Ease Stress

The old belief that laughter is good medi- cine is now being taken seriously. Som e hospitals abroad now provide "humour rooms" for alling patients, therapists teach "smile therapy, "and an organization known as "Nurses for laughing" is gaining popular- ity, states a journal. The old belief that laughter is good medi- cine is now being taken seriously. Som e hospitals abroad now provide "humour rooms" for alling patients, therapists teach "smile therapy, "and an organization known as "Nurses for laughing" is gaining popular- ity, states a journal.

The reports note that researchers have found that laughter could be "an antidote to stress" and good for the immune system." One even calls it "internal jogging.' According to a report, a psychology Professor claims that laughter increases the pain threshold by releasing endophine, the body's natural pain killers. And a therapist says that facial laugh muscles "instruct the brain to feel good, regardless of how you feel". - Awake. BODY FITNESS Your Thighs BODY FITNESS Your Thighs
If your inner thigh is looking less than lovely this simple exercise will work out wonders. If your inner thigh is looking less than lovely this simple exercise will work out wonders.
HOW TO DO II HOW TO DO II

Lie on the floor on your right side, legs in with your hips and ribs. Extend both legs and cross the left leg over the right, leaning the knee on the floor to support your back. Flexing the foot on your right leg, attempt to lift it, making sure your inner thigh muscle is facing the ceiling. Hold the lift for a split second and try not to let your leg drop to the floor. Start with eight repetition on each side and increase by four per week until you reach 32. Try to do the exercise every second day - any more and you may strain yourself. Lie on the floor on your right side, legs in with your hips and ribs. Extend both legs and cross the left leg over the right, leaning the knee on the floor to support your back. Diary: Of A Care Free Single Girl Diary: Of A Care Free Single Girl

I was carried away by Peter's Christmas gift. Ifelt reluctant to say anything because of the way he treated me at the club the other day. I was carried away by Peter's Christmas gift. Ifelt reluctant to say anything because of the way he treated me at the club the other day.

"So Korede, wetin we go do now, I wan come carry you next week make we go beach go play if I no go my village for Anambra state." "So Korede, wetin we go do now, I wan come carry you next week make we go beach go play if I no go my village for Anambra state."

My mind went to Nkechi, the lady who met us at the club and went away with Peter. Peter noticed my mood and he said: "Korede you still dey vex? why now? I think say you no dey jealous why you come dey remember the thing wey don happen before. Na dat girl wan die for my neck, I think you see am dat day as she dey behave. Korede I don settle with am." Itold Peter my mind though I clung to the NS,000 he gave me. My mind went to Nkechi, the lady who met us at the club and went away with Peter.
